title: Incorrect behavior when using custom cookie name for URL rewriting
description: The bug report highlights an issue in Servlet 3.0 ch.7.1.1 where it states that a custom cookie name affects URL rewriting. However, the actual behavior is different. The attached war file (cookiename.war) reproduces this issue. When accessing http://localhost:8080/cookiename/, the page sets a cookie with the name MYSESSIONCOOKIE but the Reload link on the page uses the default 'jsessionid' instead of the custom cookie name. The bug report urges that the documentation should be updated to reflect this inconsistency.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Deploy the attached war file (cookiename.war). 2. Access http://localhost:8080/cookiename/.
